cause.description:
NORTHEAST TROPICS IS AN ALL-STAR CHEER GYM. NET HAS JUST RECENTLY SIGNED A LEASE TO TAKE OVER A 10,000 SQ FOOT BUILDING :) WITH THIS NET NEEDS ALOT OF HELP REFURBISHING AND REDECORATING. ALSO IN THE MEANTIME WE ARE LOOKING TO RAISE MONEYS SO ALL OF OUR TEAMS CAN GO TO A NATIONAL COMPETITION. PLEASE HELP US BY MAKING SMALL DONATIONS. ANYTHING AND EVERYTHING COUNTS.. THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT
1. HELP REDECORATE NET
2. HELP OUR GIRLS MAKE IT TO NATIONALS
cause.mission: RASIE MONEY FOR NATIONALS AND NETS REDECORATION
cause.name: NORTHEAST TROPICS
